education_text.0: In 1969, Wozniak returned to the      San Francisco Bay Area San Francisco Bay Area after being expelled from the      University of Colorado Boulder University of Colorado Boulder in his first year for hacking the university's computer systemHe enrolled at      De Anza College De Anza College in Cupertino before transferring to the      University of California, Berkeley University of California, Berkeley, in 1971Beyond engineering, Wozniak's second lifelong goal had always been to teach elementary school because of the important role teachers play in students' livesBeyond engineering, Wozniak's second lifelong goal had always been to teach elementary school because of the important role teachers play in students' livesBeyond engineering, Wozniak's second lifelong goal had always been to teach elementary school because of the important role teachers play in students' livesIn October 2017, Wozniak founded      Woz U Woz U, an online educational technology service for independent students and employees
